EmailTemplate.name: Branding Requirement Cover Email
EmailTemplate.subject: ASA School Branding Requirements
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, thank you for your interest in branding ASA Direct for {!Account.Name}. We only have a few easy steps to complete the branding of ASA Direct with your school’s graphics, colors and text elements: Step 1 is to give ASA permission to use the school’s images. A Branding Agreement between ASA and the school is attached, please return to me prior to sending any branding images. Step 2 is to send ASA the branding images after the Agreement has been executed. ASA will then create the school-branded site and provide you with the URL. Step 3 is your feedback after you have reviewed the branded site so that we can make any needed modifications. Step 4, after any modifications have been reviewed by you, is to get the branded URL to school users; I will discuss options with you at that time. A document detailing technical specifications for all brandable elements of ASA Direct for Schools is located at http://www.amsa.com/content/ASA_Direct_Branding.pdf . If you have any questions about branding ASA Direct for , please contact me or ASA Product Development and Support at brandingsupport@amsa.com . Sincerely,
